title: Need to mix it up a bit
body:
What are some champions that are secretly op, but rarely if ever picked? An example of what I'm asking for is Galio. He is pretty tanky and has very high damage. I don't care what lane or role, but suggestions for this along with the champ would be nice.

Thanks guys.

replies.body:
For maximum fun if ahead - {{item:3931}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3031}} {{item:1306}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3026}}   -- Can replace GA for something like {{item:3102}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3508}} 

In general also fun - {{item:3933}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3153}} {{item:1306}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3742}}
Okay, I will try this build. Thanks

I have played her a couple of times, but I can't get over her horrible laning phase. I might try her again though, since her late game is scary with that spammable tank-busting Q.

Also I didn't know what to build on her. Could you provide a build or at least a suggestion on what stats?

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gLqoLPsI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-26T04:21:19.490+0000)
>
> I have played her a couple of times, but I can't get over her horrible laning phase. I might try her again though, since her late game is scary with that spammable tank-busting Q

Take her jungle too if you wish It's obviously not the best but it's heaps of fun :)
Now I've never heard of jungle Poppy, which is the exact reason I'm going to try it xD

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gLqoLPsI,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-26T04:30:49.217+0000)
>
> Now I've never heard of jungle Poppy, which is the exact reason I'm going to try it xD

How did you go?
Haven't done it in PvP yet (stupid Kindred on free week) but when I tried her clears in a custom game, it was surprisingly fast. The only issue I had though was not knowing what to build on her.
I main Zac. One of the best under-rated junglers in my opinion. Vel'Koz I do not own, but so far he is my favourite mid laner. I have never played Lissandra, and will try her when she is free next.
